citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 129PM on
17-MAY-17.
Access to the site was limited by a closed gate with three no trespassing signs posted. The licensee was contacted
by phone and a voicemail message left. No response was received.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 129PM on
17-MAY-17.
Access to the site was limited by a closed gate with three no trespassing signs posted.  The licensee was contacted
by phone and a voicemail message left.  No response was received.
